long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a Gmail extension powered by ChatGPT! This extension revolutionizes email communication by automatically generating personalized replies in various stylesâ€”friendly, casual, professional, and more. Whether you're responding to colleagues, friends, or clients, this extension ensures your emails are always on point. Streamline your inbox management and elevate your email conversations with our intelligent Gmail extension today!

Key Features :-

- Review Email :- Enhances the quality of mail written by user in personalized ways

- Signature Block:- Saves signature block of user which is added at the end of email

- Multiple Replies:- User can generate replies to multiple mails at a time by selecting required mails.

- Designed for Integration between Gmail and ChatGPT:- Specifically optimized for smooth integration with the Gmail and ChatGPT.

Don't worry about drafting the perfect email reply. With GmailMate extension, you can quickly generate personalized responses, saving you time and keeping your communication effective. This extension streamlines your email management.
